data.title: University of Calgary Continuing Education
data.meta_description: We provide high-quality education for lifelong learners. Our courses and programs are designed for adults seeking professional development and personal enrichment.
data.text:
Donate to Continuing Education

Support our mission of empowering students to better contribute to their families, organizations, and the communities in which they live and work.

Donate today

The university is closed on Monday, September 2 for Labour Day. Regular hours resume on Tuesday, September 3. Enjoy the long weekend!

For those of you who know our student portal by the name 'Destiny One', we would like to inform you that it is now called the 'Professional and Continuing Education Portal'. Not to worry... the portal continues to work as it always has!

Learn more...

This new program explores the process and practice of change management, change theories, and their applications in informing and guiding your work. At 80 hours, it is comprised of four courses that can all be applied towards the 200-hour Certificate in Change Management.

Learn more...
